name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: diagnosis_vertebral_compression_fracture_osteoporotic
description: Diagnosis of osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture (VCF)

name: vcf_onset_duration_weeks
description: Duration of osteoporotic VCF symptom onset (acute < 6 weeks, subacute 6-12 weeks)

name: vcf_location
description: Anatomical location of vertebral compression fracture (T1-L5)

name: imaging_mri_bone_marrow_edema
description: Presence of bone marrow edema on MRI for VCF documentation

name: imaging_bone_scan_uptake
description: Presence of uptake on bone scan for VCF documentation

name: imaging_spect_uptake
description: Presence of uptake on SPECT for VCF documentation

name: imaging_ct_uptake
description: Presence of uptake on CT for VCF documentation

name: patient_hospitalization_status
description: Indicates if the patient is currently hospitalized

name: pain_score_NRS
description: Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) pain score

name: pain_score_VAS
description: Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score

name: pain_score_threshold_hospitalized
description: Minimum NRS or VAS pain score (>= 8) for hospitalized patients to be eligible

name: pain_score_threshold_non_hospitalized
description: Minimum NRS or VAS pain score (>= 5) for non-hospitalized patients to be eligible

name: non_surgical_management_attempted
description: Flag indicating optimal non-surgical management (NSM) has been attempted

name: pain_worsening_flag
description: Flag indicating worsening pain despite NSM for non-hospitalized patients

name: pain_stable_or_improved_flag
description: Flag indicating stable or improved pain (but still NRS or VAS >=5) despite NSM for non-hospitalized patients

name: vertebral_body_height_loss_progression
description: Flag indicating progression of vertebral body height loss

name: vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage
description: Percentage of vertebral body height reduction (>25%)

name: kyphotic_deformity_present
description: Presence of kyphotic deformity

name: roland_morris_disability_questionnaire_score
description: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire (RDQ) score (>17) indicating severe impact on daily functioning

name: bmd_evaluation_referral_required
description: Requirement for referral for Bone Mineral Density (BMD) evaluation

name: osteoporosis_education_referral_required
description: Requirement for referral for osteoporosis education

name: osteoporosis_program_participation_required
description: Requirement for participation in an osteoporosis prevention or treatment program

name: back_pain_non_vcf_etiology
description: Exclusion if current back pain is not primarily due to VCF

name: osteomyelitis_present
description: Exclusion if osteomyelitis is present

name: discitis_present
description: Exclusion if discitis is present

name: active_systemic_infection_present
description: Exclusion if active systemic infection is present

name: surgical_site_infection_present
description: Exclusion if active surgical site infection is present

name: pregnancy_status
description: Exclusion if patient is pregnant

name: vertebral_fractures_per_procedure_max
description: Maximum number of vertebral fractures allowed per procedure (max 3)

name: allergy_bone_cement_present
description: Exclusion if allergy to bone cement is present

name: allergy_opacification_agents_present
description: Exclusion if allergy to opacification agents is present

name: uncorrected_coagulopathy_present
description: Exclusion if uncorrected coagulopathy is present

name: spinal_instability_present
description: Exclusion if spinal instability is present

name: myelopathy_from_fracture_present
description: Exclusion if myelopathy from the fracture is present

name: neurologic_deficit_present
description: Exclusion if neurologic deficit is present

name: neural_impingement_present
description: Exclusion if neural impingement is present

name: fracture_retropulsion_present
description: Exclusion if fracture retropulsion is present

name: canal_compromise_present
description: Exclusion if canal compromise is present

name: oswestry_disability_index_score
description: Oswestry Disability Index (ODI) score

name: sf36_v2_pcs_score
description: Short Form-36 Questionnaire Physical Component Summary (SF-36v2 PCS) score

name: euroqol_5_domain_score
description: EuroQol-5-Domain (EQ-5D) score

name: non_operative_medical_therapy_duration_hours
description: Duration of failed non-operative medical therapy (24 hours)

name: medical_therapy_failure_window_weeks
description: Maximum duration of failed medical therapy for acute VCFs (< 3 weeks)

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: Covered CPT codes for Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation, including 22510, 22511, 22512, 22513, 22514, 22515.

name: mortality_benefit_percentage_10_year
description: 10-year mortality benefit percentage associated with Vertebral Augmentation (22%)
